class_notes: Fundamental concepts and quantitative techniques of empirical political inquiry. Introduction to concepts of measurement, parametric, and non-parametric statistics. Basic bivariate and univariate statistics used in political science.
course_description: Fundamental concepts and quantitative techniques of empirical political inquiry. Introduction to concepts of measurement, parametric, and non-parametric statistics. Basic bivariate and univariate statistics used in political science.
prerequisites: QTM 100 or QTM_OX 100 or MATH_OX 117 or MATH_OX 117Q or QTM 220 or ECON 220 or ECON_OX 220 or POLS 310 or POLS 310W or ISOM 350 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1310, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-1p, Instructor: D. Davis III, Status: Open
